By translating complex climate and socio-environmental data into accessible visual formats, data visualization supports better decision-making, enabling targeted interventions, risk prioritization, and policies that advance decent work in agriculture. --- ![](img/04_viz_vector.png){width=100% height=100%} ### Download {.appendix} {{< downloadthis img/viz_vector.pdf dname=clidewo_climate_hazard_vectorborne label="Download the pdf" icon=file-earmark-pdf type=Warning >}} --- [^1]: International Labour Organization (ILO). *Ensuring safety and health at work in a changing climate*.
